participant_1.background:
I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard.
i have an iq of 250.
I enjoy playing tennis because it is a good workout and I can play with my friends.
i really like cake and don t prefer vegetables.
I like to listen to music while I work out to help me push myself.

participant_2.background:
I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it.
i worry about money even though i am in high school.
I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
my feet are size six women s.

content.text: I'm into model airplanes and I love reading books.
Cool! I like to play tennis and listen to music while I work out.
I wish I could play tennis, but I'm afraid of crashing my model airplane.
That's understandable. I used to be afraid of crashing my bike, but I just kept practicing and now I'm not afraid anymore.
I'm not sure if I could get over my fear of crashing, but I could try.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's good exercise.
Good! I'm sure you'll love it.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fiction, especially mysteries and thrillers.
I like those too! I just finished reading a really good thriller called The Silent Patient.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
